You know more than I do... I wish I was a technie geek.
I don't understand =
any of it, but as a paranormal investigator
I am fascinated by the instrume=
nts that come out, and
want to know everything......
Deb
 

_______________=
_________________

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroup=
s.com] On Behalf
Of Bryan Whatley
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 9:33 AM
To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



I don't thin=
k the Puck and Ovilus work together.  They are separate
pieces with the sam=
e basic concepts, only different features.

I'm not sure of the exact mathe=
matical calculations on what it does
(have to look through older emails), b=
ut based off the result, it
assigns it a word from a list.  As always, I as=
sume there is a chance
that it could leave words out as nothing is complete=
 in the paranormal
world.  Again, don't quote me, Bill Chappal, who I belie=
ve built it,
would know much better than me.

One day I'll get enough money=
 to buy one and try it out.  I'm a technie
geek so I like to have the lates=
t toys. :)



----- Original Message ----< br>From: "Fransen, Debbie"
<debb=
ie.fransen@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 12,=
 2008 8:14:56 AM
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



Thanks Bryan for repl=
ying
I was absolutely amazed when I saw that. 
Does the puck and the ovilus=
 work together? 
This is very interesting. How do you think it works as far=
 as
assigning a word according to the results from the sensors?
Could it le=
ave words out? Example: What if something said
Demon ( that was in Paranorm=
al State) and it was trying to
say Not Demon?
 

__________________________=
______

From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mailto:EVP- ITC@yahoogroups. com] O=
n
Behalf Of Bryan Whatley
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 9:11 AM
To: EVP-IT=
C@yahoogroups .com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



Hi Debbie,
   I thi=
nk the Ovilus is similar to the Paranormal Puck.  What it does
is take cons=
tant evironmental readings off the sensors inside it, does
some math on the=
m, then based off the result, assigns it to a word from
a list of words it =
knows.  That word is then output through a speakjet
microchip that you hear=
.
   I could be wrong though, but from my techie point of view...it's
prett=
y darn cool. :)
All the best,
Bryan  


----- Original Message ----
From: "=
Fransen, Debbie" <debbie.fransen@ delta.com>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
S=
ent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 7:41:17 AM
Subject: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus



I=
 don't know how many of the members watch Paranormal State, but they
used
a=
 new piece of equipment called The Ovilus. You guys have got to check
this
=
out. Go to www.digitaldowsing. com <http://www.digitaldowsing.com> . I
am n=
ot really sure who these guys are, and
where they came up with this. To me,=
 it sounds kind of like Frank's Box,
but
not the same.
Frank, please take a=
 look at this, and tell us what  you think.
I don't understand how it works=
......
Deb
